Original:
Mini Base 小喬室是一間氣氛蠻不錯的酒吧
週六晚上吃完晚餐大概 20:00 左右來

我們問可不可以坐沙發

但是晚一點人多的時候要請你們換過來

I feel that the overall decoration and the sofa are very comfortable
It's very relaxed,
You can chat with your friends and drink

The side of the bar is bright and the design is pretty beautiful

The wine list mainly tried the shop's signature bartender
It must be said that it is relatively disappointing, a big cup,
Drink like a drink

It is pretty good to drink when drinking drinks

Original: Minibase 是一顆隱藏的寶石，隱藏在中山區一條安靜的街道上。酒吧有著黑暗的地下酒吧氛圍，散發著精緻和獨特的氣息。儘管氣氛喜怒無常，但由於友好的當地顧客，酒吧內部卻充滿生機和活力。儘管我們是外國人，但工作人員對我們非常熱情和耐心，讓我們有賓至如歸的感覺。菜單是英文寫的，讓我們點菜很方便，而且啤酒和啤酒小吃都是一流的。如果您正在尋找獨特且難忘的酒吧體驗，我強烈建議您查看 Minibase
EN: Minibase is a hidden gem that hides on a quiet street in Zhongshan District.The bar has a dark underground bar atmosphere, exuding exquisite and unique atmosphere.Although the atmosphere is furious, the inside of the bar is full of vitality and vitality due to friendly local customers.Although we are foreigners, the staff is very enthusiastic and patient with us, so that we have the feeling of guests.The menu is written in English. It is convenient for us to order, and beer and beer snacks are first -class.If you are looking for a unique and unforgettable bar experience, I strongly recommend that you check minibase
